original_title: Developer of Black Myth: Wukong announces new game
article_summary: Chinese gaming company Game Science, developer of the successful game Black Myth: Wukong, has announced a new title in the series, Black Myth: Zhong Kui. Set in ancient Chinese folklore, the single-player action role-playing game is currently in development, with a release date yet to be determined. The success of Black Myth: Wukong, based on the classical Chinese literary masterpiece "Journey to the West," has boosted confidence among Chinese game developers to expand into overseas markets.</s>
